text: The 2015 Porsche Carrera Cup Italia season was the ninth Porsche Carrera Cup Italy season. It began on 30 May at Monza and finished on 18 October in Mugello, after seven events with two races at each event, except for the Spa- Francorchamps round. Riccardo Agostini won the drivers' championship driving for Antonelli Motorsport - Centro Porsche Padova, and Tsunami Racing Team won the teams' championship ==Teams and drivers== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size: 85%;" !Team ! !Drivers !Class !Rounds |- |rowspan=5| Dinamic Motorsport | 3 | Mattia Drudi |align=center| S | All |- |rowspan=2| 33 | Thomas Biagi | | 4 |- | Alessandro Bonacini | | 6 |- | 56 | Niccolò Mercatali |align=center| M | 1–3, 5, 7 |- | 67 | Alex de Giacomi |align=center| M | All |- |rowspan=4| LEM Racing | 4 | Aku Pellinen |align=center| S | All |- | 5 | Stefano Colombo |align=center| S | All |- | 6 | Dasheng Zhang |align=center| S | All |- | 91 | Walter Ben |align=center| M | All |- |rowspan=4| Ghinzani Arco Motorsport |rowspan=3| 9 | Andrea Fontana |align=center| S | 1–5 |- | Matteo Torta | | 6 |- | Kevin Giovesi | | 7 |- | 81 | Marco Cassarà |align=center| M | All |- | Antonelli Motorsport -
